entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -42.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 06:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -42.5°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -47.3°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 38.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 59 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
